description:
All 12 Gold Saints gather since the Wailing Wall! With the purpose of reviving on earth close at heart, they face the false god Loki who’s armed with the Spear of Gungnir! However, the 12 Gold Saints are overpowered by the absolute power of god.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let Our Prayers Be Heard! The Eternal Golden Legend!
Todoke Warera no Omoi! Eien no Ougon Densetsu
届け我らの想い! 永遠の黄金伝説
